#{idItem}
mapper.insert:
SELECT REPLACE(UUID(),'-','') FROM DUAL
insert into SP_COMMODITY_INFO
ID,
FAVG_COST_PRICE,
FAVG_SALE_PRICE,
FCOST_PRICE,
FMARKET_PRICE,
FSALE_PRICE,
ICOMMODITY_FLOAT,

ISTORE_DEVICE,
IWEIGTH,
SADD_USER,
SBIG_CATEGORY_ID,
SBIG_CATEGORY_NAME,
SBRAND_ID,
SBRAND_NAME,
SCATEGORY_CODE,
SCATEGORY_NAME,
SCODE,
SCOMMODITY_IMG,
SLABEL_ID,
SLABEL_NAME,
SMANUFACTURER,
SMERCHANT_CODE,
SMERCHANT_ID,
SNAME,
SORIGIN,
SPACKAGE_UNIT,
SPACKAGING_MATERIAL,
SPRODUCT_BARCODE,
SREMARK,
SSHORT_NAME,
SSMALL_CATEGORY_ID,
SSMALL_CATEGORY_NAME,
SSPEC_UNIT,
STASTE,
SUPDATE_USER,
SVR_CODE,
SVR_COMMODITY_CODE,
SVR_COMMODITY_ID,
TADD_TIME,
TUPDATE_TIME,

mapper.update:
update SP_COMMODITY_INFO
FAVG_COST_PRICE=#{favgCostPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
FAVG_SALE_PRICE=#{favgSalePrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
FCOST_PRICE=#{fcostPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
FMARKET_PRICE=#{fmarketPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
FSALE_PRICE=#{fsalePrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
ICOMMODITY_FLOAT=#{icommodityFloat,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
IDEL_FLAG=#{idelFlag,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
IELECTRONIC_FLOAT=#{ielectronicFloat,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
IIDENTIFICATION_TYPE=#{iidentificationType,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
IIS_USE_INTEGRAL=#{iisUseIntegral,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
IJOIN_ACTIVE_NUM=#{ijoinActiveNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
ILIFE_TYPE=#{ilifeType,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
IMAX_INTEGRAL=#{imaxIntegral,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
ISALE_NUM=#{isaleNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
ISHELF_LIFE=#{ishelfLife,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
ISPEC_WEIGHT=#{ispecWeight,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
ISTATUS=#{istatus,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
ISTORE_DEVICE=#{istoreDevice,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
IWEIGTH=#{iweigth,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
SADD_USER=#{saddUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SBIG_CATEGORY_ID=#{sbigCategoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SBIG_CATEGORY_NAME=#{sbigCategoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SBRAND_ID=#{sbrandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SBRAND_NAME=#{sbrandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCATEGORY_CODE=#{scategoryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCATEGORY_NAME=#{scategoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCODE=#{scode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCOMMODITY_IMG=#{scommodityImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SLABEL_ID=#{slabelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SLABEL_NAME=#{slabelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SMANUFACTURER=#{smanufacturer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SMERCHANT_CODE=#{smerchantCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SMERCHANT_ID=#{smerchantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SNAME=#{sname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SORIGIN=#{sorigin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SPACKAGE_UNIT=#{spackageUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SPACKAGING_MATERIAL=#{spackagingMaterial,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SPRODUCT_BARCODE=#{sproductBarcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SREMARK=#{sremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SSHORT_NAME=#{sshortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SSMALL_CATEGORY_ID=#{ssmallCategoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SSMALL_CATEGORY_NAME=#{ssmallCategoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SSPEC_UNIT=#{sspecUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STASTE=#{staste,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUPDATE_USER=#{supdateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SVR_CODE=#{svrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SVR_COMMODITY_CODE=#{svrCommodityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SVR_COMMODITY_ID=#{svrCommodityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TADD_TIME=#{taddTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TUPDATE_TIME=#{tupdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID= #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update SP_COMMODITY_INFO
SMANUFACTURER=#{smanufacturer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STASTE=#{staste,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPACKAGING_MATERIAL=#{spackagingMaterial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPRODUCT_BARCODE=#{sproductBarcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SORIGIN=#{sorigin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SSHORT_NAME=#{sshortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IIDENTIFICATION_TYPE=#{iidentificationType,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, SSMALL_CATEGORY_ID=#{ssmallCategoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SSMALL_CATEGORY_NAME=#{ssmallCategoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SBIG_CATEGORY_ID=#{sbigCategoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SBIG_CATEGORY_NAME=#{sbigCategoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ICOMMODITY_FLOAT=#{icommodityFloat,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
IELECTRONIC_FLOAT=#{ielectronicFloat,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
IWEIGTH=#{iweigth,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
FAVG_COST_PRICE=#{favgCostPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
FAVG_SALE_PRICE=#{favgSalePrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
FCOST_PRICE=#{fcostPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
FMARKET_PRICE=#{fmarketPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
FSALE_PRICE=#{fsalePrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
IDEL_FLAG=#{idelFlag,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
IIS_USE_INTEGRAL=#{iisUseIntegral,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
IJOIN_ACTIVE_NUM=#{ijoinActiveNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
ILIFE_TYPE=#{ilifeType,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
IMAX_INTEGRAL=#{imaxIntegral,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
ISALE_NUM=#{isaleNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
ISHELF_LIFE=#{ishelfLife,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
ISPEC_WEIGHT=#{ispecWeight,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
ISTATUS=#{istatus,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
ISTORE_DEVICE=#{istoreDevice,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
SADD_USER=#{saddUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SBRAND_ID=#{sbrandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SBRAND_NAME=#{sbrandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCATEGORY_CODE=#{scategoryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCATEGORY_NAME=#{scategoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCODE=#{scode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCOMMODITY_IMG=#{scommodityImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SLABEL_ID=#{slabelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SLABEL_NAME=#{slabelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SMERCHANT_CODE=#{smerchantCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SMERCHANT_ID=#{smerchantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SNAME=#{sname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SPACKAGE_UNIT=#{spackageUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SREMARK=#{sremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SSPEC_UNIT=#{sspecUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUPDATE_USER=#{supdateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SVR_CODE=#{svrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SVR_COMMODITY_CODE=#{svrCommodityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TADD_TIME=#{taddTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TUPDATE_TIME=#{tupdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where SVR_COMMODITY_ID=#{svrCommodityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update SP_COMMODITY_INFO
SLABEL_ID=#{slabelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SLABEL_NAME=#{slabelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FCOST_PRICE=#{fcostPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, FMARKET_PRICE=#{fmarketPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, FSALE_PRICE=#{fsalePrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, SREMARK=#{sremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STASTE=#{staste,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPACKAGING_MATERIAL=#{spackagingMaterial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPRODUCT_BARCODE=#{sproductBarcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SORIGIN=#{sorigin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IIDENTIFICATION_TYPE=#{iidentificationType,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, SSHORT_NAME=#{sshortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ICOMMODITY_FLOAT=#{icommodityFloat,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
IELECTRONIC_FLOAT=#{ielectronicFloat,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
IWEIGTH=#{iweigth,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
FAVG_COST_PRICE=#{favgCostPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
FAVG_SALE_PRICE=#{favgSalePrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
IDEL_FLAG=#{idelFlag,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
IIS_USE_INTEGRAL=#{iisUseIntegral,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
IJOIN_ACTIVE_NUM=#{ijoinActiveNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
ILIFE_TYPE=#{ilifeType,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
IMAX_INTEGRAL=#{imaxIntegral,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
ISALE_NUM=#{isaleNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
ISHELF_LIFE=#{ishelfLife,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
ISPEC_WEIGHT=#{ispecWeight,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
ISTATUS=#{istatus,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
ISTORE_DEVICE=#{istoreDevice,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
SADD_USER=#{saddUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SBIG_CATEGORY_ID=#{sbigCategoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SBIG_CATEGORY_NAME=#{sbigCategoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SBRAND_ID=#{sbrandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SBRAND_NAME=#{sbrandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCATEGORY_CODE=#{scategoryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCATEGORY_NAME=#{scategoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCODE=#{scode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCOMMODITY_IMG=#{scommodityImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SMERCHANT_CODE=#{smerchantCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SMERCHANT_ID=#{smerchantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SNAME=#{sname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SPACKAGE_UNIT=#{spackageUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SSMALL_CATEGORY_ID=#{ssmallCategoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SSMALL_CATEGORY_NAME=#{ssmallCategoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SSPEC_UNIT=#{sspecUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUPDATE_USER=#{supdateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SVR_CODE=#{svrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SVR_COMMODITY_CODE=#{svrCommodityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SVR_COMMODITY_ID=#{svrCommodityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TADD_TIME=#{taddTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TUPDATE_TIME=#{tupdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID= #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select A.ID,A.FAVG_COST_PRICE,A.FAVG_SALE_PRICE,A.FCOST_PRICE,A.FMARKET_PRICE,A.FSALE_PRICE,A.ICOMMODITY_FLOAT,A.IDEL_FLAG, A.IELECTRONIC_FLOAT,A.IIDENTIFICATION_TYPE,A.IIS_USE_INTEGRAL,A.IJOIN_ACTIVE_NUM,A.ILIFE_TYPE,A.IMAX_INTEGRAL, A.ISALE_NUM,A.ISHELF_LIFE,A.ISPEC_WEIGHT,A.ISTATUS,A.ISTORE_DEVICE,A.IWEIGTH,A.SADD_USER,A.SBIG_CATEGORY_ID, A.SBIG_CATEGORY_NAME,A.SBRAND_ID,A.SBRAND_NAME,A.SCATEGORY_CODE,A.SCATEGORY_NAME,A.SCODE,A.SCOMMODITY_IMG, A.SLABEL_ID,A.SLABEL_NAME,A.SMANUFACTURER,A.SMERCHANT_CODE,A.SMERCHANT_ID,A.SNAME,A.SORIGIN,A.SPACKAGE_UNIT, A.SPACKAGING_MATERIAL,A.SPRODUCT_BARCODE,A.SREMARK,A.SSHORT_NAME,A.SSMALL_CATEGORY_ID,A.SSMALL_CATEGORY_NAME, A.SSPEC_UNIT,A.STASTE,A.SUPDATE_USER,A.SVR_CODE,A.SVR_COMMODITY_CODE,A.SVR_COMMODITY_ID,A.TADD_TIME,A.TUPDATE_TIME, B.SNAME as merchantName from SP_COMMODITY_INFO A LEFT JOIN SH_MERCHANT_INFO B ON A.SMERCHANT_ID=B.ID
order by
${orderStr}
FIELD(A.ISTATUS,20), A.TADD_TIME DESC

select A.ID,A.FAVG_COST_PRICE,A.FAVG_SALE_PRICE,A.FCOST_PRICE,A.FMARKET_PRICE,A.FSALE_PRICE,A.ICOMMODITY_FLOAT,A.IDEL_FLAG, A.IELECTRONIC_FLOAT,A.IIDENTIFICATION_TYPE,A.IIS_USE_INTEGRAL,A.IJOIN_ACTIVE_NUM,A.ILIFE_TYPE,A.IMAX_INTEGRAL, A.ISALE_NUM,A.ISHELF_LIFE,A.ISPEC_WEIGHT,A.ISTATUS,A.ISTORE_DEVICE,A.IWEIGTH,A.SADD_USER,A.SBIG_CATEGORY_ID, A.SBIG_CATEGORY_NAME,A.SBRAND_ID,A.SBRAND_NAME,A.SCATEGORY_CODE,A.SCATEGORY_NAME,A.SCODE,A.SCOMMODITY_IMG, A.SLABEL_ID,A.SLABEL_NAME,A.SMANUFACTURER,A.SMERCHANT_CODE,A.SMERCHANT_ID,A.SNAME,A.SORIGIN,A.SPACKAGE_UNIT, A.SPACKAGING_MATERIAL,A.SPRODUCT_BARCODE,A.SREMARK,A.SSHORT_NAME,A.SSMALL_CATEGORY_ID,A.SSMALL_CATEGORY_NAME, A.SSPEC_UNIT,A.STASTE,A.SUPDATE_USER,A.SVR_CODE,A.SVR_COMMODITY_CODE,A.SVR_COMMODITY_ID,A.TADD_TIME,A.TUPDATE_TIME from SM_DEVICE_STOCK C INNER JOIN sp_commodity_info A ON C.SMERCHANT_ID = A.SMERCHANT_ID and C.SCOMMODITY_ID = A.ID
order by
${orderStr}
FIELD(A.ISTATUS,20), A.TADD_TIME DESC
mapper.update: update SP_COMMODITY_INFO set IJOIN_ACTIVE_NUM=IFNULL(IJOIN_ACTIVE_NUM,0)+1 where SMERCHANT_ID=#{smerchantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and IDEL_FLAG=0 and ISTATUS = 10
update SP_COMMODITY_INFO set IJOIN_ACTIVE_NUM=IFNULL(IJOIN_ACTIVE_NUM,0)+1 where SMERCHANT_ID=#{smerchantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and id in (${commodityIds}) and IDEL_FLAG=0 and ISTATUS = 10
mapper.select:
select
from SP_COMMODITY_INFO where smerchant_id = #{smerchantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and istatus=10 and idel_flag=0

SELECT SCI.SNAME,SCI.FSALE_PRICE,SSD.FCOST_AMOUNT,IFNULL(SSD.FTAX_POINT,0) FTAX_POINT from sp_commodity_info SCI INNER JOIN SM_DEVICE_STOCK SDS on SDS.SCOMMODITY_ID = SCI.id AND SDS.SMERCHANT_ID =SCI.SMERCHANT_ID RIGHT JOIN SM_STOCK_DETAIL SSD ON SDS.ID = SSD.SSTOCK_ID AND SSD.SCOMMODITY_ID = SDS.SCOMMODITY_ID WHERE SCI.ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND SCI.SMERCHANT_ID =#{merchantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND SCI.IDEL_FLAG =0 AND SCI.ISTATUS = 10 AND SDS.SDEVICE_ID =#{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY SSD.TADD_TIME DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT A.ID, concat( A.SBRAND_NAME, A.SNAME, A.STASTE, A.ISPEC_WEIGHT, A.SSPEC_UNIT ) AS SPNAME, A.SBRAND_NAME, A.SNAME, A.SSPEC_UNIT, A.FAVG_COST_PRICE, A.FAVG_SALE_PRICE, A.FCOST_PRICE, A.FMARKET_PRICE, A.FSALE_PRICE, A.IDEL_FLAG, A.IIDENTIFICATION_TYPE, A.IIS_USE_INTEGRAL, A.IJOIN_ACTIVE_NUM, A.ILIFE_TYPE, A.IMAX_INTEGRAL, A.ISALE_NUM, A.ISHELF_LIFE, A.ISTATUS, A.ISTORE_DEVICE, A.SADD_USER, A.SBIG_CATEGORY_ID, A.SBIG_CATEGORY_NAME, A.SBRAND_ID, A.SCATEGORY_CODE, A.SCATEGORY_NAME, A.SCODE, A.SCOMMODITY_IMG, A.SLABEL_ID, A.SLABEL_NAME, A.SMANUFACTURER, A.SMERCHANT_CODE, A.SMERCHANT_ID, A.SSHORT_NAME, A.SORIGIN, A.SPACKAGE_UNIT, A.SPACKAGING_MATERIAL, A.SPRODUCT_BARCODE, A.SREMARK, A.SSHORT_NAME, A.SSMALL_CATEGORY_ID, A.SSMALL_CATEGORY_NAME, A.SUPDATE_USER, A.SVR_CODE, A.SVR_COMMODITY_CODE, A.SVR_COMMODITY_ID, A.TADD_TIME, A.TUPDATE_TIME, A.SMERCHANT_CODE, B.SNAME as MERCHANT_NAME FROM SP_COMMODITY_INFO A LEFT JOIN SH_MERCHANT_INFO B ON A.SMERCHANT_ID=B.ID
ORDER BY
${orderStr}
FIELD(A.ISTATUS,20), A.TADD_TIME DESC
